BANK.description: Commercial banks, Islamic banks, microfinance banks

CORPORATE.revenue_gross: Gross sales/revenue BEFORE any deductions (sales tax, excise, rebates, discounts)
CORPORATE.revenue_deductions: Sales tax, excise duty, rebates, discounts, commissions deducted from gross revenue
CORPORATE.revenue_net: Net sales/revenue AFTER all deductions. This is the primary revenue figure.
CORPORATE.cost_of_revenue: Cost of goods sold / Cost of sales / Operating expenses (for oil & gas)
CORPORATE.royalties: Government royalties, levies on production (common in oil & gas, mining)
CORPORATE.exploration_cost: Exploration and prospecting costs (oil & gas, mining)
CORPORATE.other_cost_adjustments: Any other costs between revenue and gross profit not captured by the above
CORPORATE.gross_profit: Revenue - Cost of Revenue + Other Cost Adjustments
CORPORATE.operating_expenses: Aggregate of selling, administrative, and other operating expenses (includes embedded depreciation)
CORPORATE.other_operating: PLUG: operating_profit - gross_profit + operating_expenses (captures unlabeled items)
CORPORATE.operating_profit: Gross Profit - Operating Expenses + Other Operating (= EBIT in most cases)
CORPORATE.other_income: Non-operating income (dividend income, rental income, etc.)
CORPORATE.profit_before_levy: Profit before levy and taxation (if levy is shown separately). Maps to 'Profit before Taxation and Levy'.
CORPORATE.levy: Workers' Welfare Fund, Workers' Profit Participation Fund, and similar levies (distinct from income tax)
CORPORATE.taxation_current: Current period income tax expense (component of taxation)
CORPORATE.taxation: Total income tax expense. Map ONLY the total, not components (current/deferred go to their own fields)
CORPORATE.net_profit: TOTAL profit after taxation (before attribution split). Use this for company-level metrics.
CORPORATE.net_profit_parent: Profit attributable to equity holders of parent/holding company. Use this for EPS calculations.
CORPORATE.nci_income: Profit attributable to non-controlling interests (minority shareholders)
CORPORATE.depreciation_amortization: Total D&A from Cash Flow Statement (authoritative source)
CORPORATE.net_profit_cf_start: Starting point for cash flow (should equal net_profit from P&L)
CORPORATE.gain_on_sale_fixed_assets: Gain/loss on disposal of fixed assets (non-cash adjustment in CFO)
CORPORATE.unrealized_gain_on_investments: Unrealized gain/loss on investments marked to market (non-cash)
CORPORATE.fair_value_gains_losses: Fair value adjustments on financial instruments
CORPORATE.share_of_profit_associates: Share of profit/loss from associates and joint ventures
CORPORATE.provisions_cf: Provisions and reversals (non-cash adjustments in CFO)
CORPORATE.other_operating_adjustments: Individual non-cash adjustments in operating section (provisions, gains/losses, etc.) - NOT the section total
CORPORATE.cfo: SECTION TOTAL ONLY: 'Net cash from operating activities' or 'Cash generated from operations'. Map ONLY the final operating section total, NOT intermediate subtotals or individual line items.
CORPORATE.capex: Capital expenditures - purchases of property, plant, equipment, and intangibles
CORPORATE.acquisitions: Cash paid for business acquisitions and subsidiary purchases
CORPORATE.asset_sales: Proceeds from sale of fixed assets and subsidiaries
CORPORATE.investment_purchases: Purchases of investments, securities, term deposits
CORPORATE.investment_sales: Proceeds from sale of investments, securities, term deposits
CORPORATE.gain_on_securities: Realized gain/loss on sale of securities
CORPORATE.other_investing: Other investing activities not covered by capex/acquisitions/sales/investments
CORPORATE.cfi: SECTION TOTAL ONLY: 'Net cash from investing activities'. Map ONLY the final investing section total, NOT individual line items.
CORPORATE.borrowings_raised: Proceeds from new borrowings, loans, debt issuance
CORPORATE.borrowings_repaid: Repayment of borrowings, loans, debt principal
CORPORATE.borrowings_raised_repaid: Net borrowings when raised and repaid are combined in one line
CORPORATE.change_in_borrowings: Net change in borrowings from financial institutions
CORPORATE.gain_on_lease_termination: Gain/loss on lease termination or modification
CORPORATE.other_financing: Other financing activities (lease payments, transaction costs, etc.)
CORPORATE.cff: SECTION TOTAL ONLY: 'Net cash from financing activities'. Map ONLY the final financing section total, NOT individual line items.
CORPORATE.fx_adjustment: Effects of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents (foreign currency translation)
CORPORATE.cash_start: Cash and cash equivalents at beginning of period
CORPORATE.net_cash_change: SECTION TOTAL: Net increase/decrease in cash and cash equivalents for the period
CORPORATE.cash_end: Cash and cash equivalents at end of period

BANK.net_interest_income: Bank Interest Income - Bank Interest Expense
BANK.other_bank_adjustments: PLUG: profit_before_tax - total_income + operating_expenses + provisions + other_charges
BANK.gain_loss_derecognition: Gain/loss on derecognition of financial assets

INSURANCE.underwriting_profit: Net Premium - Claims - Commission + Other Underwriting
INSURANCE.other_insurance_adjustments: PLUG: profit_before_tax - underwriting_profit - investment_income - other_income + operating_expenses

extraction_notes.depreciation_source: Always extract from Cash Flow Statement, not P&L. P&L depreciation is embedded in operating expenses and unreliable.
extraction_notes.revenue_mapping: Map gross revenue to revenue_gross, deductions to revenue_deductions, net revenue to revenue_net. Do NOT map multiple overlapping revenue figures to the same field.
extraction_notes.revenue_segments: Local/Export breakdowns go to revenue_local/revenue_export, not revenue_net
extraction_notes.subtotals: Do NOT map generic 'Total' or 'Sub-total' rows - these are intermediate calculations
extraction_notes.operating_cash_flow_definition: Use NET operating cash flow (after interest and taxes paid), not 'cash generated from operations'
extraction_notes.taxation_mapping: Map total taxation to 'taxation', current component to 'taxation_current', deferred to 'taxation_deferred'. Do NOT map both total and components to 'taxation'.
extraction_notes.levy_vs_tax: Levy (WWF, WPPF) is separate from income tax. Map to 'levy', not 'taxation'.
extraction_notes.operating_expenses_rule: Map individual expense lines (admin, selling, distribution) to operating_expenses. Do NOT also map 'Total Expenses' or 'Total Operating Expenses' - choose components OR total, not both.
extraction_notes.net_profit_attribution: Map TOTAL 'Profit after taxation' to net_profit. Map 'Attributable to owners/parent' to net_profit_parent. Map 'Attributable to NCI' to nci_income. Do NOT map attribution lines to net_profit.
extraction_notes.cash_flow_section_totals: CRITICAL: cfo, cfi, cff are SECTION TOTALS only. Map ONLY lines that say 'Net cash from operating/investing/financing activities' or similar. Individual items within each section (premiums received, claims paid, capex, loan proceeds, etc.) should be mapped to their specific canonicals (other_operating_adjustments, capex, borrowings_raised, etc.), NOT to the section total. There should be exactly ONE cfo, ONE cfi, and ONE cff per cash flow statement.
extraction_notes.borrowings_combined: When borrowings raised and repaid are shown as a single net line, use borrowings_raised_repaid instead of borrowings_raised or borrowings_repaid
extraction_notes.cash_positions: Extract cash_start (beginning balance), net_cash_change (movement), and cash_end (ending balance) when available
